snippet.title: Introducing Dream Gen
snippet.description:
If you think this project is cool consider sharing it with a friend :)

⚠️⚠️ Out now on Steam ⚠️⚠️
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2862580/Dream_Gen/

Support us and get latest early access releases from our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/CloudStation

Join our discord to discuss all things related to Dream Gen/Cloud Station: https://discord.gg/KThThvT3bh

Follow us on other platforms: https://hyperfollow.com/cloudstation

0:00 - Intro
0:19 - What is Dream Gen?
0:28 - Presets
0:42 - Creating a polyrhythm
1:13 - Audio settings
1:28 - Low Pass Filtering
1:42 - Reverb
2:10 - Visual settings
2:18 - Bloom
2:28 - Particles
2:37 - Pendulum
2:47 - Linear
2:57 - Circular
3:07 - Void
3:16 - MIDI Export
3:40 - Support the development
4:42 - Default Pendulum (Demo 1)
5:42 - Chordal (Demo 2)
6:42 - Heavy (Demo 3)
7:42 - Clusters (Demo 4)
8:42 - Unseen (Demo 5)
9:42 - Mayhem (Demo 6)
10:42 - Slowly (Demo 7)
11:42 - Ableton x Dream Gen (MIDI Export Demo)

#dreamgen #polyrhythms #musicproduction  #ableton #protools #logicprox #generativemusic
